headline: American Express: Too Soon To Buy The Dip Given Travel Exposure
summary: American Express (AXP) sees a 20% stock drop amid economic uncertainty and slowing revenue growth. See why we are neutral on AXP stock.

headline: 3 No-Brainer Warren Buffett Stocks to Buy Right Now
summary: The Oracle of Omaha, as Warren Buffett is known, has an incredible track record as an investor, and he frequently offers words of wisdom to his many fans.  If you're looking for some investments to shore up your own portfolio as the volatility on Wall Street intensifies, Amazon (NASDAQ: AMZN), American Express (NYSE: AXP), and Coca-Cola (NYSE: KO) are three great and resilient stocks that have also earned Buffett's stamp of approval.
